section: The business name of the Venture will be BM&V2GO.
explanation: The agreement does not define what 'BM&V2GO' refers to, leaving it open to interpretation. This creates an in-text contradiction because, without a clear definition, the name's significance and relevance to the venture's purpose are unclear.

section: The Purpose of the Venture will be determined by the Managers.
explanation: This section gives full authority to the managers, but there is not a set parameter or any requirements that dictate the purpose of the venture. This can be interpreted in many ways and can be deemed as vague.

section: Each of the Members has contributed to the capital of the Venture, in cash or property in agreed upon value, as follows (the "Capital Contribution"): Member Contribution Description Agreed Value BorrowMoney.com, inc To be determined USD JVLS, LLC dba Vaccines 2Go $60,000.00 USD From Monthly Government , City And State, And Or Private Awarded Contracts. Plus (10%) Of Any Generated Gross Revenue, In Add i t i on to The To ta l Contributions. $3,500,000.00 USD
explanation: The capital contribution of BorrowMoney.com, inc. is listed as 'To be determined USD'. This is an omission of a key detail, as the agreed value of their contribution is not specified. This creates an in-text contradiction because, without a defined contribution from BorrowMoney.com, the overall capital structure and equity distribution of the venture are unclear.
